extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 4 and registration in a PHIL Major or Medial Plan and (a minimum GPA of 2.60 in PHIL250 and PHIL257) and (6.0 units in PHIL).

basic.description: An examination of major issues in hermeneutics or the theory of interpretation. Possible topics to be studied include the history of hermeneutics, objectivity and relativism, critiques of ideology, semiotics, and pragmatism.
basic.subject: PHIL
basic.title: Hermeneutics
